description: Try our easy to follow Vegetarian Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegie burger,Pescatarian,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Plant-based,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato
name: Vegetarian Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook market vegetarian tomato, onion and basil burgers following the packet instructions. Cover to keep warm.
Place buttermilk, mayonnaise and basil leaves in a food processor and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer to a jug. Place the bases of seeded bread rolls onto a serving plate. Top with butter lettuce leaves, tomatoes, carrot and vegetable burger.
Run a peeler along the length of Lebanese cucumber to form ribbons. Pile cucumber ribbons onto burgers and spoon over sauce. Add bread roll tops. Serve.
